channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Apple’s New Passwords App May Solve Your Login Nightmares
item.description: Apple is launching its first stand-alone password manager app in iOS 18. Here’s what you need to know.

item.title: 11xAI raises $24M led by Benchmark to build AI digital employees
item.description: The Series A comes about a year after 11xAI raised a $2 million seed round led by Project A Ventures. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For pers...

item.title: Apple AirPods 4 and AirPods 4 With Active Noise Cancellation Review: Not Worth It
item.description: Apple has refreshed its cheapest wireless earbuds and split features into two models. The AirPods 4 raise more questions than answers.

item.title: TechCrunch Minute: FDA approval sets the stage for Apple’s AirPod hearing aids
item.description: During last week’s GlowTime event, Apple announced that iOS 18 will include a feature allowing users with mild to moderate hearing loss to use AirPods...

item.title: Scientists Crack a 50-Year Mystery to Discover a New Set of Blood Groups
item.description: We now know why some blood is missing a key antigen—leading to the creation of a new blood-grouping system. Experts believe even more discoveries are ...

item.title: As TikTok ban heads to court, ByteDance’s Lemon8 surges
item.description: As TikTok heads to court on Monday to argue against a U.S. ban, parent company ByteDance’s newer social app, Lemon8, is once again surging to the top ...

item.title: Apple AirPods 4 and AirPods 4 With Active Noise Cancellation Review: Not Worth It
item.description: Apple has refreshed its cheapest wireless earbuds and split features into two models. The AirPods 4 raise more questions than answers.

item.title: U.S. government expands sanctions against spyware maker Intellexa
item.description: This latest round of government sanctions land months after Intellexa's founder Tal Dilian was sanctioned for selling the Predator spyware. © 2024 Tec...

item.title: How to Choose the Right Soundbar (2024): Size, Price, Surround Sound, and Subwoofers
item.description: What size should you get? Do you need a subwoofer? Here’s everything you need to know when upgrading your TV’s audio.

item.title: Colin Kaepernick is coming to TechCrunch Disrupt 2024
